subject: Implement SeaBlueCherry dark mode color scheme
body:
Applied a vibrant ocean-inspired dark mode with the following colors:
- Background: #0A1221 (very dark navy-blue)
- Primary: #1E90FF (vivid teal-blue for buttons/links)
- Secondary: #E91E63 (vibrant magenta-pink for highlights)
- Text: #F0F4FF (near-white with blue tint)
- Text Secondary: #A0B0D0 (muted blue-gray)

Changes:
- Updated core theme colors in styles/theme.js
- Extended Tailwind config with new color utilities
- Replaced all hardcoded colors in components and screens
- Updated loading spinners to use secondary color
- Updated placeholder text to use textSecondary color
- Updated read receipt indicators to use primary color
- Updated shadow colors to match new palette

The color scheme maintains a fresh, energetic beach/ocean feel while
optimizing for dark mode viewing with reduced eye strain and improved
contrast.
title: Implement SeaBlueCherry dark mode color scheme
